thread.title: Liverpool To Raid Middlesbrough For Surprise Summer Signing
thread.title_full: Liverpool To Raid Middlesbrough For Surprise Summer Signing

title: Liverpool To Raid Middlesbrough For Surprise Summer Signing
text:
Liverpool To Raid Middlesbrough For Surprise Summer Signing Fri Feb 10 2017 19:58:16   19:58:16 GMT+0000 (GMT) Ryan Sidle Ryan Sidle in football 
The Premier League season is far from over but it already feels like everyone is battling for second place. That's not good news for the rest of the season but the likes of Liverpool can eye up their transfers for the summer. 
Jurgen Klopp would have had some strong hopes for his team going into this summer and early on it looked like he would have been right. 
Even at the turn of the year things were going pretty well but a terrible start to 2017 has seen them win just one game and get knocked out of the EFL and FA Cups. 
One of the contributing factors was the loss of Saido Mane to the African Cup of Nations and that has highlighted the need for better strength in depth at Anfield. 
So it's no surprise that Jurgen Klopp is looking at attacking players but somewhat more surprising that Calcio Mercato are reporting that the Reds have already held talks with Middlesbrough over the signing of Gaston Ramirez. 
The 26 year old attacking midfielder recently handed in a transfer request towards the end of the January transfer window. 
That was after Leicester City showed interest towards the Uruguayan and tried to sign him. However Aitor Karanka rejected the request and Ramirez is back into the squad. 
Ramirez has made 14 starts in the league for Boro so far this season and has scored two goals and set up two for his teammates. 
Previously Ramirez had trouble at former club Southampton and was desperate to make a move to the Riverside Stadium where he helped them gain promotion to the Premier League. 
Early reaction by some Liverpool fans suggests it wouldn't be the most popular move for the Anfield club to make: Joe Heart throws to Chilwell, plays it into Gaston Ramirez who slots Troy deeney through straight on goal nd liverpool stay 15th - moneyball fc (@JOZ9T9) February 9, 2017 Went from being linked to Aubameyang to Gaston Ramirez. Life as a Liverpool fan. https://t.co/OTntrwd9Z0
